attack-object.name: Valid Accounts
attack-object.comments: This control is still in preview, so its coverage will likely expand in the future. This mapping is based on its current (preview) state.
attack-object.score-comment: This control's detection is specific to the Cosmos DB and therefore provides minimal overall detection coverage for Valid Accounts resulting in a Minimal score. A relevant alert is "Access from an unusual location to a Cosmos DB account".

attack-object.name: Data from Information Repositories
attack-object.comments: This control is still in preview, so its coverage will likely expand in the future. This mapping is based on its current (preview) state.
attack-object.score-comment: This control triggers an alert when an unusually large amount of data is extracted from/by an account compared to recent activity. False positives are fairly likely and extraction in quantities below the control's threshold is not detected, so score is Minimal. Neither of the sub-techniques are relevant in this context, since they are repository-specific.  Relevant alert is "Unusual amount of data extracted from a Cosmos DB account"
